languages.text:
"Незнанья нега — сладостный нектар.
Прильни к нему, пока прозрение
Не осушит бокал до дна за миг".

"Oh nectar sweet — your name is ignorance!
Make sure to savour every drop before
Your glass is drained by insight in a blink."
languages.original_text:
"Незнанья нега — сладостный нектар.
Прильни к нему, пока прозрение
Не осушит бокал до дна за миг".

languages.text:
「ああ、蜜の甘さよ…そなたの名は無知！
ひとしずくごとに味わうといい
そのグラスが瞬時の洞察で枯れてしまう前に」
languages.original_text:
"Oh nectar sweet — your name is ignorance!
Make sure to savour every drop before
Your glass is drained by insight in a blink."

traits.locale_text:
「ああ、蜜の甘さよ…そなたの名は無知！
ひとしずくごとに味わうといい
そのグラスが瞬時の洞察で枯れてしまう前に」
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
“噢，甜美的甘露——你的名字叫无知！
请细细品味每一滴琼浆的香醇，
以免深刻的思想转瞬间将它蒸腾。”
languages.original_text:
"Oh nectar sweet — your name is ignorance!
Make sure to savour every drop before
Your glass is drained by insight in a blink."

traits.locale_text:
“噢，甜美的甘露——你的名字叫无知！
请细细品味每一滴琼浆的香醇，
以免深刻的思想转瞬间将它蒸腾。”
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
« Du doux nectar de l'ignorance,
Il faut savourer chaque gorgée,
Avant que le savoir, dans son indifférence,
N'en prive à jamais votre esprit éclairé. »
languages.original_text:
"Oh nectar sweet — your name is ignorance!
Make sure to savour every drop before
Your glass is drained by insight in a blink."

traits.locale_text:
« Du doux nectar de l'ignorance,
Il faut savourer chaque gorgée,
Avant que le savoir, dans son indifférence,
N'en prive à jamais votre esprit éclairé. »
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
«¡Oh, dulce néctar! ¡Tu nombre es ignorancia!
Apresúrate de saborear cada gota antes de
que la razón te vacíe el vaso en un instante».
languages.original_text:
"Oh nectar sweet — your name is ignorance!
Make sure to savour every drop before
Your glass is drained by insight in a blink."

traits.locale_text:
«¡Oh, dulce néctar! ¡Tu nombre es ignorancia!
Apresúrate de saborear cada gota antes de
que la razón te vacíe el vaso en un instante».
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Oh, Nektar ... dein Name ist Ignoranz!
Koste jeden einz'len Tropfen, ehe
Dein Glas durch Einsicht zur Gänze versiegt."
languages.original_text:
"Oh nectar sweet — your name is ignorance!
Make sure to savour every drop before
Your glass is drained by insight in a blink."

traits.locale_text:

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.original_text:
"Oh nectar sweet — your name is ignorance!
Make sure to savour every drop before
Your glass is drained by insight in a blink."

traits.locale_text:
"Ah, nektar gibi tatlı ismin cehaletle yankılanır,
Bir anda gelen irfan, bardağını bomboş bırakır!
Sen sen ol, öncesinde her bir damlanın tadına var."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle
